import React from 'react'; import { FiShield, FiTruck, FiClock, FiStar, FiUsers, FiAward } from 'react-icons/fi'; const About = () => { const stats = [ { icon: , value: '1,25,000+', label: 'Happy Customers' }, { icon: , value: '4.7/5', label: 'Customer Rating' }, { icon: , value: '200+', label: 'Repairs Daily' }, { icon: , value: '5+', label: 'Years Experience' } ]; const features = [ { icon: , title: 'Quality Assurance', description: 'We use only genuine parts and provide warranty on all repairs to ensure your device works like new.' }, { icon: , title: 'Free Pickup & Delivery', description: 'Convenient doorstep service with free pickup and delivery for your damaged devices.' }, { icon: , title: 'Quick Turnaround', description: 'Most repairs completed within 24-48 hours with express service options available.' }, { icon: , title: 'Expert Technicians', description: 'Certified technicians with years of experience in mobile device repair and maintenance.' } ]; const team = [ { name: 'Rajesh Kumar', role: 'Founder & CEO', image: 'üë®‚Äçüíº', description: '10+ years in mobile technology and repair industry' }, { name: 'Priya Sharma', role: 'Head of Operations', image: 'üë©‚Äçüíº', description: 'Expert in service operations and customer experience' }, { name: 'Amit Singh', role: 'Lead Technician', image: 'üë®‚Äçüîß', description: 'Certified repair specialist with 8+ years experience' }, { name: 'Sneha Patel', role: 'Customer Success Manager', image: 'üë©‚Äçüíª', description: 'Dedicated to ensuring customer satisfaction and support' } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

About GoFix

We are India's leading mobile repair service provider, committed to delivering professional, reliable, and affordable repair solutions for all your mobile devices.

{/* Stats Section */}
{stats.map((stat, index) => (
{stat.icon}
{stat.value}
{stat.label}
))}
{/* Our Story Section */}

Our Story

Founded in 2019, GoFix started with a simple mission: to provide reliable, professional mobile repair services that customers can trust. What began as a small repair shop has grown into one of India's most trusted mobile repair service providers.

We recognized the frustration customers faced with unreliable repair services, poor quality parts, and lack of warranty. That's why we built GoFix with a focus on transparency, quality, and customer satisfaction.

Today, we serve over 1,25,000 happy customers across multiple cities, completing more than 200 repairs daily with our team of certified technicians and genuine parts inventory.

üè¢

GoFix Headquarters

Bangalore, India

{/* Features Section */}

Why Choose GoFix?

We're committed to providing the best mobile repair experience with professional service and genuine parts.

{features.map((feature, index) => (
{feature.icon}

{feature.title}

{feature.description}

))}
{/* Mission & Vision Section */}

Our Mission

To provide professional, reliable, and affordable mobile repair services that exceed customer expectations. We strive to make mobile repair convenient and trustworthy through innovative service delivery and transparent communication.

Our Vision

To become India's most trusted mobile repair service provider, known for quality, reliability, and customer satisfaction. We envision a future where mobile repair is hassle-free, transparent, and accessible to everyone.

{/* Team Section */}

Meet Our Team

Our dedicated team of professionals is committed to providing you with the best mobile repair experience.

{team.map((member, index) => (
{member.image}

{member.name}

{member.role}

{member.description}

))}
{/* Values Section */}

Our Values

These core values guide everything we do at GoFix.

Trust

We build trust through transparency, honest communication, and reliable service delivery.

Excellence

We strive for excellence in every repair, using quality parts and skilled technicians.

Customer First

Our customers are at the heart of everything we do. Their satisfaction is our priority.

{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Experience the GoFix Difference?

Join thousands of satisfied customers who trust GoFix for their mobile repair needs.

Book Repair Service Contact Us
); }; export default About;
